creditline: The Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: old sepia-toned photograph of two lines of young Caucasian women wearing blankets and headbands with feathers, with their hair in braids; "Land of the Pilgrims'" printed in black at top; "Pride" at bottom center, covered in black sequins
markings: at bottom on back, in pencil: 1/10
medium: Archival digital print, with collaged sequins
signed: at bottom on back, in pencil: Land of the Pilgrims Pride  Tom Jones 2002
title: Dear America: Land Of The Pilgrims Pride
